meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>art</kanji>s are performed by <kanji>someone</kanji>. Who is that someone? Well, think about the reading for this kanji. Do you recognize the word? It's <vocabulary>geisha</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
